name: World Explorer (itch) (SparrowDev)
description: World Explorer is a 2D pixel-art adventure game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours by a beginner game developer known as SparrowDev. Try to survive and collect the CUBE OF GODS in the harsh environment of an unusual rocky planet guarded by an ancient civilazation. Every time you fail your and your planet's statistics change which makes it harder to avoid obstacles.
